backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with extensive Mood and Gender variants plus text conversion helpers for each.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for build-planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with light and dark CSS variable palettes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document mounting the app and loading the main TypeScript entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and global providers including theme, query client, and sound context.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Empty placeholder file for an app footer component.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Header with app branding, theme toggle, journal button, and user menu including profile and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Authenticated app layout with header, bottom nav, journal overlays, logout redirect handling, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with icons, active-state highlighting, and unread notifications badges.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Displays a floating action button for composing a new journal entry when visibility is enabled.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Provides a button to toggle between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gates content behind Internet Identity authentication, showing a loader or login panel as needed.
Shows a styled login screen with randomized copy, feature highlights, error handling, and Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Displays a summary of circle energy generated from posts using a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Lists circle members with profile data, pulse scores, and the ability to remove members.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form for submitting a share code to request joining a circle with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Shows pending join requests with profile details and actions to accept or decline.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Manages selection of up to two safe people with recommendations, profile lookup, and backend updates.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Displays and edits the user's share code with copy, edit, and save actions backed by mutations.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: Wraps a button with an icon and tooltip, forwarding all button props.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Provides a collapsible section with a trigger button and animated content area.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Shows a daily mood check‑in reminder card with navigation and dismiss handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Renders a silent signal entry with mood display, author info, and styling based on mood category.
Lets users send predefined silent signals to Safe People, handling setup checks and send state.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Popover date picker for journal entries, preventing future dates and updating selection.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Displays journal entries for a date with creation, deletion, and editing limited to today.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Right‑side sheet showing the journal with rules, date picker, and entries panel.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Displays micro-action suggestions based on mood history, with a fallback message when data is insufficient.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood trends and distributions over a selected timeframe and shows results along with micro-action suggestions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Provides UI for selecting system avatars or uploading custom images with validation and preview handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Handles profile loading, error states, and triggers onboarding if the user has no profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Onboarding flow for creating a user profile, collecting name, gender, birthdate, preferences, and generating a share code.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Plays sound effects when new notifications, feed items, join requests, or circle member changes are detected.
frontend/src/components/status/AudienceS: UI component for choosing post audience, including radio options and selectable circle members with profiles and ages.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: Picker for predefined and custom context tags with validation and selected tag management.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Mood selection UI with search, category grouping, and color‑coded mood buttons.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Alert dialog prompting users to write a private note and showing micro‑action suggestions.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a status post with author info, mood styling, audience privacy indicators, and timestamp.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Defines predefined context tags, soft limits, and custom tag length config.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Contains core app promise and boundary text.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Provides login screen phrases and a helper to pick a random one.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines all mood options with labels, emojis, and categories.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Exports sound asset paths and a type for sound cues.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Defines a fixed list of system avatars with IDs and paths plus a helper to look up paths by ID.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: React context managing visibility state for a floating journal with show/hide controls.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Provides state and controls for opening and closing the journal overlay, including reset-to-today behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Manages global sound settings, audio unlocking, and playback functions for notification-related sounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor with additional error tracking and a refetchable query for actor initialization status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout logic, and persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Hooks for querying, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a filtered, sorted mood history for the current user from recent feed status posts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react‑query hooks for user profiles, avatars, requests, posts, notifications, and related mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Simple wrapper returning the sound context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark mode CSS variables plus safe-area padding utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the Circle page with tabs for members, requests, joining, and safe people, including circle energy status.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesImInPage.tsx: Displays circles the user belongs to with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ClosestConnectionsPag: Shows ranked closest connections with loading/error handling and progressive disclosure details.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Provides a status composer with mood, content, audience selection, context tags, and post submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Implements the daily check-in flow with mood selection, audience options, and guard-based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the feed with refresh, reminder, composer, and cards for statuses or silent signals.
frontend/src/pages/HomeRoutePage.tsx: Routes users to public home, feed, or loading state based on Internet Identity status.
frontend/src/pages/InviteCodeAuthStepPag: Handles invite-code-based login flow, auto-joining a circle after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows notifications, allows marking them read, and links to related statuses.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits user profile, avatar, preferences, and pulse score.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomePage.tsx: Public landing page with invite code entry and onboarding info.
frontend/src/pages/StartAuthPage.tsx: Launches Internet Identity login and redirects to the app after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single status post with loading, error, and permission handling plus navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Provides helpers to calculate age, format a date for input, and parse date strings into bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/audience.ts: Builds a unique audience list for a post, always including the author.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Analyzes recent posts to derive a weekly vibe and generates a seeded, non-clinical summary phrase.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Normalizes and validates user-defined context tags, checking length and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Manages a sessionStorage guard flag for one-time daily check‑in entry.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCodeSession.ts: Stores, retrieves, clears, and normalizes invite codes in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Suggests brief micro‑actions based on recent mood patterns and context tags using conservative rules.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Computes mood distribution, trends, concern level, and guidance with a non-clinical disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Controls a once‑per‑day mood reminder using localStorage to track dismissal.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Utilities for deriving avatar image sources, validating avatar uploads, converting files to byte arrays, and revoking blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character alphanumeric, ambiguity‑free share code.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets a boolean sound‑enabled preference in localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Helpers for converting between bigint timestamps and Date, checking date ranges, and formatting dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, sizing, plugins, and extended design tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata summarizing current architecture, planned membership changes, and known issues.
